alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 04 at 9:07PM MST until December 05 at 9:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sudden and significant reductions in visibility in areas of dense fog. Visibility will be reduced below 1/4 mile to near zero in some places. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest New Mexico. Mostly over the lowlands and deserts. * WHEN...From 2 AM overnight tonight to 9 AM MST Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
